The '''Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan''' is a more powerful version of the [[Big Ball Rasengan]].

== Usage ==
In an instant, the user creates a Rasengan of gigantic proportions.<ref name="d3"/> When it impacts, there is a large shock wave unleashed that can send unsuspecting shinobi flying. As with many Rasengan variants, Naruto needs the help of a [[shadow clone]] in the Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan's formation.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 560, page 9</ref> By the time he's [[Hokage]], Naruto can perform this technique with one hand and even pass it on to [[Boruto Uzumaki]] to use.<ref name="BBR-movie">''Boruto: Naruto the Movie''</ref><ref name="BBR-anime">''Boruto'' episode 65</ref> This jutsu is so chakra-intense that it was capable of overwhelming Delta's shinobi-ware's formidable chakra absorption capabilities.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 33</ref>

== Senjutsu Influence ==
[[File:Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan.png|thumb|left|A senjutsu-enhanced Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan.]]
When in [[Sage Mode]], the user can perform a [[senjutsu]]-enhanced version known as {{translation|'''Sage Art: Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan'''|仙法・超大玉螺旋丸|Senpō: Chō Ōdama Rasengan|engtv=Sage Art: Massive Rasengan}}.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 497, page 4</ref> It is said that its destructive power – were it to explode – would easily carve away an entire mountain.<ref name="d3" /> Fittingly, upon its first successful use it blasted through a [[God Tree]] and kilometres of mountainside before bursting in the upper atmosphere, killing an empowered [[Momoshiki Ōtsutsuki]].<ref name="BBR-movie" /><ref name="BBR-anime" />
{{-L}}

== Trivia ==
* According to its [[Sha no Sho]] entry, the standard Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan also used [[natural energy]] when used by Jiraiya.<ref name="d3" />
* In the games, Jiraiya is able to use this technique without Sage Mode, though he referred to it as the {{translation|'''Gallant Rasengan'''|豪傑螺旋丸|Gōketsu Rasengan}}.
